titleInfo.title: Abushakir; Computational treatise “Sea of computation”; f. Ir:አቡቫክር /ባህረ-ሃሳብ/ [Äbu¯akər Bahrä-hasab];

name.namePart: Abū Šakir b. Abī l-Karem Buṭrus b. al Muhaddib Ibn ar-rāhib (c. 1200-95, Egypt); Abba Wäldä Tənśaʾe (f. IIv,4);

originInfo.publisher: Monastery of Gunda Gunde, Ethiopia University of Toronto Scarborough Library; Hill Museum and Monastic Library, Collegeville, Minnesota

mods.accessCondition: Professor Michael Gervers, University of Toronto, Toronto, Ontario, Canada, Ewa Balicka-Witakowska, Uppsala, Sweden, and Father Columba Stewart, Hill Museum & Manuscript Library, Saint John’s University, Minnesota, U.S.A
